data.eml:eml: Three new species of earthworms belonging to the genus Amynthas (Oligochaeta: Megascolecidae) from Hainan Island, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Jing, Zhao, Qi, Qiu, Jiang-Ping (2010): Three new species of earthworms belonging to the genus Amynthas (Oligochaeta: Megascolecidae) from Hainan Island, China. Zootaxa 2680: 26-32, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199320
